storyInfo: Lava and Kroos, having been sent to Yan by Nian, save an unlucky Messenger, Mr. Nothing. They take him up on his offer to serve as a guide, and he leads them to Mount Hui-ch'i.

attributes.text: Since ancient times, where virtue has taken its steps, vice has leapt a mile. Nature's catastrophes and humanity's calamities pain the common people to their ends.
But, as the sayings go, humanity's will conquers fate, and evil can never triumph over good.
You gallant saviors walk the cardinal winds; where found, you draw your arms to combat terrors on the weak. In all the writings new and old, how living still are such bright, flowing scholars?
Ah! As they say, 'fair the food, the wine, and the scenery, fair the people, their virtue, and their company,' we see those heroes looming out of time immemorial, each one a vast paragon of right.

attributes.content: Yes, I see you two benefactors are wonders to your cores, paragons of right, and blessed with a seldom-seen heart of chivalry; surely you must be the hermits of a realm's highest honor?

Ohh, ohh, surely the firmaments took pity on me, spoke that my life shouldn't end here... When those fiendish brutes enter my mind, my rage at once just swells in crescendo! Yet while out of my senses, I charged headlong into their lair. I lament it came to that!

It's a blessing that you two luminaries rescued me, and only then I could escape intact. As the proverb goes, mere thanks pale before a mighty grace; the least I can offer to you benefactors is a divination... what do you think of that, as a mark of tribute?
I guess if you could lemme read that divining magazine you have. Trying to pass the time right now...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: *cough*! Ahahah, Ms. Lava, that would be your misconception. As they say, bare a person not by their faults, and strike them not to their looksâ€”
Get to the point.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Ah, truly your insight is like a torch to the dark, Ms. Lava! It's just like the proverb goes; aid must be seen to the end, like boats are to shore. Though the two of you helped me fend off those things, I cannot hide it from you...
Truthfully, I've lost all my luggage. Mm, not just my rations and travel money, but my maps, tent, papers, changes of clothes and my beloved little teapot... yes, all lost.
After all, my whole carriage sank into the lake. Ahahahah.
...You still have your fishing rod and fan, though? Are you really a Messenger?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Hahah. Hah. Er, truthfully, there's some things I'd like to keep to myself... I could never get a lie past you, so I'll just have to ask you treat me like I am.
So you're looking to go with us?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Indubitably!
Uh-huh...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Ohh, ohh, how could I be so blithe about your personal business? Really, I'm loath to continue inconveniencing my benefactors...

Only, three hundred li ahead is a village by the name of Ni-weng, rich in fine jade. There's a stage station there, and as long I have a simple chair to rest on, a bowl of loose tea and the chance to get my things sorted, I'll be back in the saddle, no more troubling anyone else!
I mean, going with us is fine, but... all the gloompincers are pretty aggroed right now. Really strong attacks, too. If you wanna go with us, we're gonna need to wait until they settle down first.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Oh my, oh my, I'm being such a bother to you all. I really am so sorry.
That said, why isn't our benefactor Kroos back yet? There's no shortage of those beasts. Are you sure she won't need our help?
If you could help, why'd you get chased this far out by the gloompincers? Just hold tight and wait.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Yet your great grace saving me demands recompense, stuff a pole apart. To stand by as my other benefactor braves further danger aloneâ€”I really find it hard to bear.
What about this! I have here a copy of a workout b... nay, a secret tome, its worth formidable, that improves your figure with striking efficacy! This shall be my repayment to the two of you!
Can you stop? Chill?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Most certainly.
Fine. Stop sizing me up like that. Just ask what you wanna ask, I guess.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Ah. By your dress, you two benefactors wouldn't happen to be people of any nearby village, would you?
We're not.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: To be forward, you're not people of Yan?
Nope.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Then from where do you hail? Higashi? Ursus? Possibly somewhere even farther, like knights journeying the compass? I've heard people of foreign lands always tend to have strange traditions like that. Is it true? False?
I'm not... I... ugh.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: If I gotta say it, I'm a Victorian.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Uh... Victoria's, yeah, I hm, uh, know it well.
You have literally no idea where Victoria is, do you.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Ahahah. Foreign lands have foreign plans; only our masters in the cities would be so mindful of them. What use would we plain country folk have for ruminating?
It's just rare to see guests from afar. The way you speak the Yan tongue was decently suggestive of it, hence my curiosity.
(I kinda only looked into Yanese right before we left for... whatever.)
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Oh, Kroos is back.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: My, now, Ms. Kroos, Ms. Honorable Kroos, thank you, thank you dearly, are you hurt? Ought I give you a shoulder rub? A leg massage?
I have here a bottle of elixir, a panacea passed down for generations. Its price is, well, considerable, but in the face of you two benefactors, I'll bite my tongue. You can have it free of charge.
...I thought you lost all your luggage?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I still have some fine goods on me; backup is what the wanderer's living demands. Ah, such is our way of life.
Fine, fine, just do you. Hey, how were things up ahead?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Just a few poor li'l guys I helped find a new home. They settled right down after that.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: This way we can head on, right? We pass through that reed marsh, follow downstream, and then we've found the mountain?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Er, you helped rehome the gloompincers?
...Either way, it's sorted now. We'd better get moving, chop-chop.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Kroos, this sad Messenger guy said he wants to go with us up to Ni-weng. No problems with that?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: No problemo. You're the captain this time, Lava, mate. What you say goes.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: So you're the captain! My apologies, my apologies!
My apologies, my apologies~
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Don't make his racket worse...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Now that I mention it, I still haven't asked. What should I call you?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Me? I'm just a lilliputian Messenger; what necessity is my introduction to the stage? I'm sure you agree, ahahahâ€”
Huh?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: â€”But keeping the two of you forever in the dark would be quite unbecoming. Whatever next, ho! Mm... just call me... Mr. Nothing, then.
You just came up with that, didn't you!?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Not at all, not at all! How could I!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Hmm... that Ni-weng place. Isn't it at the foot of Mount Hui-ch'i?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: That it is, that it is! Dear benefactor, you're quite well-versed indeed to have heard word of a town so small!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Then it's right on the way, isn't it!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: How about this, Mister Mr. Nothing? We'll escort you there, but once we've reached where we're aiming for, you'll need to help us out a little too.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Not a problem! Not a problem! With my carriage in the lakebed and me waiting for a rescue team to fish it out, my plate is completely empty in the meanwhile.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Ohh, ohh... Just as the proverb goes, a drop of kindness warrants a fountain of redress! That I should have the chance so soon to repay your graces in saving my life! Surely, the heavens have smiled upon me! They have smiled upon me!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Ya know, that genuine manner with the teary voice reminds me of a certain someone who gets a chunk knocked out of her wages every couple of days.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Alrighty. Cap'n, you decided?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: You pick this moment to dump him on me?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Benefactor! Oh, benefactor! I plead that you must give me this chance!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Uh... I've gotta admit having a local would be pretty handy. And Nian's info was ambiguous anyway, that son of a... I'm not familiar with Yan's geography or environment, and finding someone's actually been a bit of a challenge...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Ugh, why did Closure give her permission to do something this annoying?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Because she's had a surprisingly productive mood recently.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Apart from playing mahjong and eating hotpot, what else has she done?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Don't do her like that. If Nian knew that was how you saw her, she'd take it hard.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: She's used to it. I'm used to her being used to it. I'm just complaining a bit about how she's giving us so much pain.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Uh... sorry. I should let you in the loop first, Mr. Nothing.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Very well. Everything you say, rest assured I'll engrave into my flesh and soul. Three recitations before bed, three when I wakeâ€”
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: It'sâ€”it's not that big a deal...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Our mission's really simple. We're finding a single person.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: One month before
Rhodes Island Landship
Yeah, um, long story short, I want you to bring my little sister back here for me.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Long story short my ass! You said basically nothing!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: C'mon, I've explained it, haven't I?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: 'I miss my family all the more on every festive day' counts as an explanation?!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Big sisters miss their li'l sisters as a matter of course. Isn't that ample reason? Your big sister yanks you around all the time, yeah? Don't you get it?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Drop that subject before you make me even less willing to helpâ€”
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: â€”Alright, even if your family's got special circumstances going on, we'd need a stupid huge amount of personnel and resources to get Rhodes Island deep into the heart of Yan.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: There's no way Closure would just roll over and let this request throughâ€”
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Yeah, she let it through.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: She didn't just let it through, she got Kroos to go with you too.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Look, c'mere, I'm betting Kroos wants to tour around Yan a bit. It's not half bad, and she's been scampering through one smoky hellscape after another. It's about time she took a vacation.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Hâ€”How did you get Closure to agreeâ€”?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Ah-hah. Don't look at me like I'm caught in the act. I really am doing it all for Rhodes Island this time.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Did you mess with the Engineering Department again?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: If giving them experimental materials worth millions counts as messing with them, then... guilty as charged.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Humanity seldom gets their hands on stuff like this. If everything goes smoothly, Rhodes Island from here on out will have first-rate, elite regular equipment to stand shoulder to shoulder with nations... if everything goes smoothly.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: What the hell did you pull this time...?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Don't ask. Time will soon tell.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I've gone years without seeing my precious sister, Dusk. All you need to know is that name. Trust me, you'll know her when you see her, and I'll be counting on you.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Why don't you go yourself?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: She's been hiding from me for years. Why would I need to do that to myself?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Fine. Even though it looks like you haven't been trying that hard...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Hey.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Since Closure gave it the go-ahead and all... uh... you remember to properly thank me afterwards.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Hey, now that's my li'l Lava... I didn't give your costume an upgrade for nothing.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Enough... just stop talking.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: It's a little present for you.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Your costume for Ancient Forge. Didn't you actually love it?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Yâ€”You're jokingâ€”
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: But you know I pretty clearly saw you spending half the day posing in front of the mirror?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Tch... go in my room without consent again, and I WILL send you out with a bang for real.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Alright, alright. You've been wearing that combat outfit for a while anyway. Even if you still can't cut open space with your daggers...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Thâ€”That was a stupid edit you decided to make to the script afterwards!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Was it? But from when I came to Rhodes Island up till now, haven't you matured a heck of a lot? And you've been learning Arts from some real serious characters.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: So in short, I leave it up to Kroos and you.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I'd better warn you just in case. She's... Dusk's no pushover. She can be a ridiculous pest. Just be prepared to deal with her, and I guarantee you'll go undefeated at mahjong afterwards.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: ...Nian.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: You've been hiding something from me, right?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Oh... if you think so, then what's the point in asking me?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Save it. I'm not gonna dig any deeper, anyway. You aren't like us, I can still tell that much.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Well, duh, where else could you find someone as terrifying as me? So?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Let me just tell you this. I'm willing to help you even though I know how much of a pain this is going to be.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: So when it comes down to it, you're not going to cut corners on 'repaying' me.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Ho-ho, li'l Lava knows the art of haggling too. Tricky, tricky... alright! I've decided!
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You drag Dusk back, and I'll grant any one request of yours. Anything goes. Such as... forging a divine weapon?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I've got six weapon concepts right now. I'm one short of seven. Any old one of them would be enough for you to leave your name in history.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Whâ€”What are they...?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: They're badass.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Or maybe you'd wanna know some ancient stuff from ancient times... I could consider telling you guys. Not too many people should reasonably know about it, I guess, but if youâ€”
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Pass.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Heyâ€”don't be so heartless. Haven't you been kinda impatient with me lately? Doesn't suit you, does it?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Oh, right, right, take this with you.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: And this is?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Just treat it like... a sort of protective charm. After all, my sister's, well...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Ohh, ohh... helping find your colleague's precious little sister, estranged for years, you traveled myriads far to this place of ours. Benefactors, surely enough, you are made of heroic stuff!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: I admire you! I cannot help but admire you!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Uh... did we go that far?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: No. We can already see Mount Hui-ch'i ahead... but it seems like it's getting late. What do we do?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I'm in no rush, no rush at all. Benefactors, do as you do.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: The address Nian gave me just says 'Outside Kou-wu City, near Mount Hui-ch'i.' Are there any other settlements around here?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: None! None for a thousand li around. Just Ni-weng Village all alone.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Maybe she's living in the mountains... after all, she's the sister of Nian. I get the feeling she might.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: ...What is it you think of her? Why do I get the feeling you're not being one bit polite to her?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Seeing as we don't have any further clues, it's your time to shine now.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Verily! I know this area well... Don't gaze at me like that, I really do know it! When I was young, I'd frolic about this place come rain or shine!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Do you have any ideas?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Ah, this I must proclaim clear to you two benefactors. If you wish to find someone in the villages surrounding Kou-wu City, you need only visit a teahouse, call out loud, and your friends and strangers alike will come rushing over.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Give me one scant hour, and I'll be sure to find yourâ€”That's right, does the person you're looking for have any particular features? What's their name? What status do they hold?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: ...She's called Dusk.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: She's a painter.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Benefactors, benefactors, I see it!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Sâ€”So it really was in the mountains... I'm beat... why do I feel like this mountain's a lot taller than it first looked?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I'm not surprised.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Well! So deep within the forests and hills, without water or electricity, she built herself a thatched cottage? Benefactors, your friend's sister truly has a mind for aesthetics.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: ...I won't hide it, I'm starting to get a bad feeling about this already.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: But the scenery here's quality, I've gotta say. If she's a painter, I can imagine her here.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Eh...? Lava? What'cha looking for?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: The 'protective charm' from Nian. I only just realized she might've had another reason for giving it to me, and more than likely, it's not anything good.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Could just... toss it, you know?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Kroos, you really are the one with the biggest complaints about her, aren't you?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Benefactors, what if I go first and ask at the door? See if anyone's in? Perhaps we've been looking in error?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: You don't need to do that. I just feel like we can't be reckless if we're meeting her sister. We need to prepare ourselves.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Hello, is anyone there?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Hello?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I presume she's out on a walk?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: In the mountains?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Yet you can see the water mottling this door, and the leaves have piled up dead. It doesn't give the air that anyone lives here... Should we try and knock?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Mm... Hello? Is anyone there?
attributes.name: Lava
